  • Classes in ParticlesSystem used by ParticlesSystem 
    Class and Description
    FreeParticle
    A free particle ise without any initial attachment.
    GridParticle
    A tied up particles is linked up to a grid, which means it has a spring attached to an initial position.
    Magnet
    A magnet is an entity which attracts particles to itself.
    Particle
    A particle is a little 2D circle in a mechanical system.
    ParticlesSystem
    A particles' System is a mechanical 2D system which contains free and tied up particles.
